home.selectUsecasesSubheader: You may select one or more use cases that interest you. Only those submodels will be displayed in successive steps that are relevant for the selected use cases. When you don’t make a selection, all submodels will be displayed.
home.exchangeDataDescription: Below you see an overview of the steps you need to proceed in order to provide data or consume data. You can use the provided links to directly access the information or functions needed regarding the respective step.

provideDataStep.manageUploadContract: Manage your uploads or contact agreements

home.sdeDescription: Simple Data Exchanger is your easy way to provide and consume data within the Catena-X network. It makes your data available to other participants respecting your individual access and usage rules. It allows you to discover data of other participants and to establish data contracts, so that you can access their data within the use cases that interest you.

provider.heading: Create Data
provider.description_1: At first you need to select the data model you want to upload from 'Select Submodel'.
provider.description_2: As second step you must select the way of uploading data:
provider.description_2_2: Manual Entry (via direct input in table-format)
provider.placeHolder: Please select a submodel (use case) for creating data.
provider.uploadInstruction: Upload your file by dropping it here.
provider.previewTableTitle: Preview of Submodel including help description
provider.uploadStep_1: 1. Choose the file you want to upload.
provider.uploadStep_2: 2. Click on “Next Step – Configure Policies” to manage with whom to share your data and register the digital twin(s)
provider.manualStep_1: 1. For manual entries click 'add a row' and enter the values by clicking inside the respective fields.
provider.manualInfo_1: For creating new data leave the field 'UUID' empty.
provider.manualInfo_2: For updating existing data you need to enter the respective 'UUID' of the digital twin.

policies.title: Policies
policies.description: Here you can manage the access policies with which partner you want to share your data.
policies.description_1: Select with whom you want to share the uploaded data
policies.description_1_1: Unrestricted: everybody within the network can see the data
policies.description_1_2: Restricted: only visible to the selected companies (search by name or BPN)
policies.description_2: Select the duration for how long you want to share the data
policies.description_3: Define the usage-purpose for the shared data (select via dropdown)
policies.note: Note: Your own organization will always be allowed to access the data
policies.warningText: If you do not assign a BPN, the data can only be accessible to you.
policies.purposeNote: Usage allowed only for the purpose
policies.roleNote: Usage allowed only by individuals with the following roles/characteristics
policies.customNote: Usage must comply to the following additional conditions

uploadHistory.description: This is an overview of your company's data delivery to the Catena-X ecosystem. All activities are listed here, i.e. creation, updates, deletion of data. Past versions of the provided data can be downloaded.

providerContracts.title: Data provider contracts
providerContracts.description: This is an overview of the data exchange contracts your organization has with other Catena-X members to provide data.

help.description: Learn more about the supported digital twin submodels and download respective templates & samples.
help.rules1: The file must be a file of type CSV (.csv extension).
help.rules2: Data fields must be separated by a semicolon (;).
help.rules3: All data fields must be present even if empty.

consumeData.description: Discover the data offer catalog of other Catena-X member companies. You can select an interesting offer and subscribe to it.

contractHistory.title: Data consumer contracts
contractHistory.description: This is an overview of the data exchange contracts your organization has with other Catena-X members to receive & consume data from them.

offerDownloadHistory.description: This history overviews your company's downloaded data from the Catena-X ecosystem. All activities are listed here. You can download the data again from this history list.

samePolicies.title: Usage policies are not identical!
samePolicies.content: The contract offers within your search results do not have an identical usage policy. Subscribing to multiple offers is only available for contract offers that have an identical policy.

offerDetails.title: Offer Details
offerDetails.confirmTermsTitle: {{ count }} contract offers will be affected by this operation.
offerDetails.cofirmTermsSubtitle: You are about to enter a legally binding contract agreement for this Contract Offer with provider
offerDetails.point1: You are entitled to represent your organization.
offerDetails.point2: You have read and understood the access/usage policy.
offerDetails.point3: Your organization will be responsible to adhere by the rules stated in the access/usage policy.

alerts.subscriptionSuccess: Contract offers subscription successfully initiated and downloaded!
